data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Tokyo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 2, In Tokyo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Goal kick for Oita at Ajinomoto Stadium.
Hiroyuki Kimura awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 4, Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Tokyo in their own half.
Free kick for Tokyo in their own half.
Free kick for Tokyo in the half of Oita.
In the minute 6, Tokyo's Leandro misses with an attempt on goal.
Oita have a goal kick.
Oita have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 10, Oita drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Throw-in Tokyo.
Can Oita get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tokyo's half?
In the minute 13, Oita advance rapidly upfield but Hiroyuki Kimura blows for offside.
Corner awarded to Oita.
Oita's Kaoru Takayama breaks free at Ajinomoto Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 15, Ball goes out of play for a Tokyo goal kick.
Throw-in for Oita at Ajinomoto Stadium.
Oita have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
In the minute 21, Hiroyuki Kimura signals a Tokyo throw-in in Oita's half.
Tokyo's Kensuke Nagai gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Tokyo.
In the minute 25, In Tokyo Tokyo attack through Diego Oliveira. The finish is off target, however.
Hiroyuki Kimura awards Oita a goal kick.
Oita awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 28, Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Oita in their own half.
Free kick for Oita in their own half.
Oita have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
In the minute 33, Throw-in for Oita in their own half.
In Tokyo, Takumi Nakamura of Tokyo is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Hirotaka Mita of Tokyo smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 35, Oita awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Tokyo, Oita push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Oita in their own half.
In the minute 40, Ball safe as Tokyo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Oita are pushing forward but Kaoru Takayama's finish is wide of the goal.
Hiroyuki Kimura awards Tokyo a goal kick.
In the minute 43, Hiroyuki Kimura signals a throw-in for Tokyo, close to Oita's area.
Arthur Silva (Tokyo) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Tokyo push upfield and Diego Oliveira gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Oita defence.
In the minute 45, It's a goal kick for the away team in Tokyo.
Hiroyuki Kimura will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Oita needs to be cautious. Tokyo have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 45, Throw-in high up the field for Tokyo in Tokyo.
Ball goes out of play for a Oita goal kick.
The first-half is over at Ajinomoto Stadium.
In the minute 46, Hiroyuki Kimura has blown to start the second-half.
Oita have a goal kick.
Free kick for Tokyo in their own half.
In the minute 50, Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Oita in their own half.
Oita to take a throw-in in Tokyo territory.
Tokyo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 53, Oita drive upfield and Kazuki Kozuka gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Tokyo defender.
Rei Matsumoto puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
Throw-in for Oita in the half of Tokyo.
In the minute 56, Free kick for Tokyo in their own half.
Free kick Tokyo.
Tokyo are coming forward and Hirotaka Mita gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 57, Goal kick for Oita at Ajinomoto Stadium.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Tokyo.
Leandro for Tokyo gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 58, Ball goes out of play for a Oita goal kick.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Tokyo.
Tokyo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 61, Leandro grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Ajinomoto Stadium.
Kensuke Nagai instrumental with a fine assist.
Adailton is on a sub for Kensuke Nagai for Tokyo.
In the minute 62, Kenta Hasegawa is making the team's second substitution at Ajinomoto Stadium with Takuya Uchida replacing Arthur Silva.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Oita awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 64, Can Oita get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tokyo's half?
Important block from the Tokyo defence as Kei Chinen fires in a strike for Oita.
Corner awarded to Oita.
In the minute 67, Kaoru Takayama of Oita gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Tokyo at Ajinomoto Stadium.
Throw-in for Tokyo in the half of Oita.
In the minute 68, Oita have a goal kick.
Naoki Nomura is replacing Daiki Watari for Oita at Ajinomoto Stadium.
In the minute 68, Tatsuya Tanaka is replacing Kazuki Kozuka for the away team.
The away team have replaced Kaoru Takayama with Yuto Misao. This is the third substitution made today by Tomohiro Katanosaka.
Tokyo make their third substitution with Taichi Hara replacing Hirotaka Mita.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Tokyo.
In the minute 72, Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Oita in their own half.
Hiroyuki Kimura awards Tokyo a goal kick.
Free kick for Tokyo in the half of Oita.
In the minute 73, Free kick Oita.
Manato Shinada is booked for the home team.
In Tokyo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 76, Free kick for Tokyo in their own half.
Oita's Toshio Shimakawa gets in a shot on goal at Ajinomoto Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Oita are coming forward and Yuta Koide gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 77, Tokyo have a goal kick.
Tokyo's Leandro is on target but unsuccessful.
The away team replace Kei Chinen with Kohei Isa.
In the minute 79, Free kick Tokyo.
Tokyo are whistled for offside.
Yuki Kagawa for Oita gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 80, Hiroyuki Kimura awards Tokyo a goal kick.
Throw-in for Tokyo in their own half.
Oita take a 1-2 lead thanks to Tatsuya Tanaka.
In the minute 83, Diego Oliveira (Tokyo) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Taichi Hara (Tokyo) strikes at Ajinomoto Stadium but his header is cleared.
Hiroyuki Kimura awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 84, Free kick for Tokyo in their own half.
Tokyo have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
Adailton gets his shot on target but fails to score for Tokyo.
In the minute 85, Goal! Oita extend their lead to 1-3 through Naoki Nomura.
Free kick for Tokyo in the half of Oita.
Tomohiro Katanosaka (Oita) is making a fifth substitution, with Kento Haneda replacing Rei Matsumoto.
In the minute 88, Corner awarded to Tokyo.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a Tokyo throw-in in Oita's half.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Tokyo.
Kyosuke Tagawa is replacing Diego Oliveira for Tokyo at Ajinomoto Stadium.
In the minute 88, The home team replace Takumi Nakamura with Hotaka Nakamura.
Goal kick for Oita at Ajinomoto Stadium.
In the minute 89, In Tokyo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ryoya Ogawa (Tokyo) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Ball goes out of play for a Oita goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Tokyo have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
Free kick Tokyo.
Can Tokyo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Oita's half?
Tokyo's Kyosuke Tagawa breaks free at Ajinomoto Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Tokyo.
Tokyo to take a throw-in in Oita territory.
In Tokyo Tokyo drive forward through Leandro. His shot is on target but it's saved.
That's full-time at Ajinomoto Stadium. The final score is 2-3.
Goal for Tokyo! They are now just 2-3 behind thanks to a Manato Shinada header.
